summary: A scientist who has invented a technology to construct virtual realities from people's memories finds himself in a perilous situation, after he reluctantly allows it to be used for a purpose he never imagined.
cast: Sasha Roiz|Jenny Mollen|Dominic Bogart|Richard Riehle|Nick Jameson|Rodney Eastman|Frank Ashmore|Brad Culver|Ty Simpkins|Sara Tomko|Augie Duke|Mattie Grace Campos|Jen Davis|Bernhard Forcher|Darren Melameth|Robert Lewis Stephenson|Matt Fowler|Jay Bingham|D.T. Carney|Chuck Cobb|Lula Dransfield|Nakoa Lee|Kaiwi Lyman|Charles Milano|Eric Darnell Redding|David Sullivan|Scott Voss|John J. Fischer
keywords: bumming a cigarette|woman wears a bikini|murder|scientist|memory
title: Extracted
